student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a Q&A exercise, by Discussing exercise routines with 'enjoy + ing', using, for example, 'I enjoy eating, I enjoy doing, I enjoy going…'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! I enjoy swimming. What kind of sport do you enjoy?
I enjoy playing soccer. What about you?
I enjoy playing soccer too! Do you enjoy running or jogging?
I enjoy jogging. Do you enjoy cycling?
Yes, I enjoy cycling! It’s fun and relaxing. Do you enjoy trying new exercises or sports?
I enjoy trying new exercises. Do you enjoy going to the gym?
Yes, I enjoy going to the gym! It helps me stay healthy. Do you enjoy working out with friends?
I enjoy working out with friends. Do you enjoy doing yoga?
Yes, I enjoy doing yoga! It’s very calming. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
